definitions.definition: The hinged part on the trailing edge of an airplane wing , used to control longitudinal turns.
A half gable, as at the end of a penthouse or of the aisle of a church .

main_definition: The hinged part on the trailing edge of an airplane wing , used to control longitudinal turns.
secondary_definitions: ( architecture ) A half gable, as at the end of a penthouse or of the aisle of a church .
